install.name: E-Pay Relay Payments
install.author: RedTeam
install.description: This plugin enables standard Epay Relay payments

param.name: merchant_id
param.label: PBS Merchant ID
param.description: The Merchant ID you have received from PBS. For testing purpose a test Merchant ID can be obtained by contacting ePay (sales@epay.dk)

param.name: verify_status
param.query: SELECT order_status_code AS st_value, order_status_name AS st_title FROM #__redshop_order_status
param.label: Order Status for successful transactions
param.description: Select the order status to which the actual order is set, if the payment transaction was successful.

param.name: invalid_status
param.query: SELECT order_status_code AS st_value, order_status_name AS st_title FROM #__redshop_order_status
param.label: Order Status for failed transactions
param.description: Select an order status for failed payment transactions.

param.name: capture_status
param.query: SELECT order_status_code AS st_value, order_status_name AS st_title FROM #__redshop_order_status
param.label: Capture Payment Status
param.description: Select an capture status for capturing payment.

param.name: payment_group
param.label: Group
param.description: To move the payment to a specified group. If not leave this field empty

param.name: epay_md5
param.label: MD5
param.description: The type of MD5 usage. 0 disables MD5. 1 uses MD5 on the accept page on this shop. 2 creates a MD5 stamp, which is send to ePay with transaction data. If this stamp does not match ePay will decline the payment.
param.option: MD5 on both data transmitted to ePay and on accept page

param.name: epay_paymentkey
param.label: MD5 key
param.description: If MD5 is enabled above the secure key for MD5 stamping is defined here (same secret key must be defined in the ePay administration). If MD5 is disabled leave this field empty.

param.name: epay_3dsecure
param.label: 3D Secure
param.option: Only payments by use of 3D secure is allowed

param.name: activate_callback
param.label: Activate callback
param.description: Callback is used to avoid missing update of the shopping system if the user closes the browser before redirect to the shop from ePay is made.(It is recommended that callback is enabled to update the shop even if the customer during the payment process closes the browser)

param.name: transaction_fee
param.label: Transaction Fee
param.description: Often it is necessary to present the transaction fee to the customer ePay will calculate the fee and put it on the payment before the payment is made
param.option: Customer does not pay the transaction fee
The customer pays the transaction fee

param.name: economic_design_layout
param.label: Enter E-conomic Design and Layout ID
